meanings.definition: The quality or state of being collectible.
meanings.sent1: Her collectibility of rare stamps made her the envy of all collectors.
meanings.sent2: The collectibility of vintage coins has increased over the years.
meanings.sent3: His obsession with the collectibility of action figures bordered on comical.
meanings.sent4: The collectibility of antique books was like a treasure hunt for him.
meanings.sent5: The collectibility of limited edition toys was evident in the excitement of the crowd.

meanings.definition: The likelihood of an item being sought after by collectors.
meanings.sent1: The collectibility of baseball cards soared after the player's record-breaking season.
meanings.sent2: A rare comic book's collectibility can be determined by its condition and popularity.
meanings.sent3: The collectibility of vintage cars made him dream of owning a classic convertible.
meanings.sent4: The collectibility of rare coins was like a hidden gem waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The collectibility of limited edition sneakers was evident in the long lines outside the store.
